means: (pl. Tuareg,Tuaregs)西撒哈拉和中撒哈拉的柏柏尔人，柏柏尔语

sentence.Network_en: Tuareg men marry women from the group . They often marry cousins.
sentence.Network_cn: 图阿雷格男人会娶同一部落的女子, 通常就是自己的堂姐妹或表姐妹.

sentence.Network_en: Tuareg cavalryman seldom reveals his face, even to a blood brother.
sentence.Network_cn: 图阿雷格人,很少有人能看到他的脸, 甚至是亲兄弟.

sentence.Network_en: This rebellion is the latest in a series of uprisings led by the Tuareg.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次的叛乱是柏柏尔人领导的一系列起义中最近的一次.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 进出口行业词汇英语翻译(T) ... tuanse 缎子 tuareg 塔雷格地毯 tub aspirini composita 复方阿司匹林片.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a nomadic Berber people of the Sahara
2. the dialect of Berber spoken by the Tuareg people

auth_sentence.content: When they see you are Tuareg, you are attacked.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: When they see you are Tuareg, you are attacked.

auth_sentence.content: Only the Tuareg have benefited from the situation.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only the Tuareg have benefited from the situation.

auth_sentence.content: Rebellion by Tuareg people in the north begins.
